channel.title: layout on darcy's
channel.description: Recent content in layout on darcy's

item.title: layout.Spacer
item.description: layout.Spacer # import "fyne.io/fyne/v2/layout" Usage # type Spacer # type Spacer struct { FixHorizontal bool FixVertical bool } Spacer is any simple object that can be used in a box layout to space out child objects func (*Spacer) ExpandHorizontal # func (s *Spacer) ExpandHorizontal() bool ExpandHorizontal returns whether or not this spacer expands on the horizontal axis func (*Spacer) ExpandVertical # func (s *Spacer) ExpandVertical() bool ExpandVertical returns whether or not this spacer expands on the vertical axis

item.title: layout.SpacerObject
item.description: layout.SpacerObject # import "fyne.io/fyne/v2/layout" Usage # type SpacerObject # type SpacerObject interface { ExpandVertical() bool ExpandHorizontal() bool } SpacerObject is any object that can be used to space out child objects
